text: People in KPRJ are friendly, very cooperative and willing to go extra miles to accommodate their clients’ needs as well as great at giving solutions. Their products are constructions, development and also selling affordable house, managing Rent to Own scheme. KPRJ now venturing on environment, digital and sports events. Do come and have a visit KPRJ’s office.

Coming here feel very welcoming with good ambience and nice interior. Their staff are not only friendly but also skilled in their field. Valuable asset to Johor state definitely! Many more recognizable achievement to KPRJ & group.
As a guest, i find that the staff acknowledge the guests quickly, feel welcomed, ample parking space, office is new so the interiors are nice
all the staffs are friendly and helpful. feel very welcoming. nice interior, facilities and environment.
Nice office. Good image for GLC to have such a nice office. Hope can benefit the rakyat more
